title: Language barriers
body: Not trying to be racist, but in games where there is a couple of people who don't speak the same language, it make the game a whole lot harder, especially when the other team all are speaking the same language and are communicating. why are there no region locks or anything? There is no way to communicate other than pings, i cant tell them to wait till I've done blue to go in, or any other basic thing. its frustrating and depressing when you get beaten by a team who is playing better than your laners and can communicate too.  either make the ping system more diverse or have language barriers in place.
